author: 0xalizk
content:
https://papers.ssrn.com/sol3/papers.cfm?abstract_id=3554458
re the 5% and escalation, this recent paper examines "how transaction fees and transaction size react to a demand shock. We find that when users are more impatient, the effect of the shock will stay shorter in the system but it will drive up the transaction fees sharply, which are consistent with empirical results."

author: 0xalizk
content: I think the escalator, or any form of "dynamizing the bid", should help with the 5%.
